data.comment: The match is underway at Municipal de Balaidos.
Guillermo Cuadra Fernandez signals a free kick to Cadiz in their own half.
In the minute 2, Cadiz needs to be cautious. Celta Vigo have an attacking throw-in.
Throw-in Celta Vigo.
Cadiz awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 5, Guillermo Cuadra Fernandez awards the home team a throw-in.
Celta Vigo take a 1-0 lead thanks to Nolito.
Iago Aspas with an assist there.
In the minute 8, Cadiz have a dangerous throw-in.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Vigo.
Celta Vigo's Joseph Aidoo misses with an attempt on goal.
In the minute 9, Ball goes out of play for a Cadiz goal kick.
Celta Vigo drive forward but Iago Aspas is judged offside.
Throw-in for Cadiz at Municipal de Balaidos.
In the minute 11, Cadiz are coming forward and Ivan Alejo gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Corner awarded to Cadiz.
Cadiz have been awarded a corner by Guillermo Cuadra Fernandez.
In the minute 11, Alvaro Negredo (Cadiz) is first to the ball but his header is off-target.
Celta Vigo have a goal kick.
Guillermo Cuadra Fernandez awards Cadiz a goal kick.
In the minute 13, Throw-in for Celta Vigo in the half of Cadiz.
Throw-in for Cadiz in their own half.
Free kick for Cadiz in their own half.
In the minute 18, Cadiz to take a throw-in in Celta Vigo territory.
Free kick Cadiz.
Guillermo Cuadra Fernandez signals a free kick to Cadiz.
In the minute 19, Goal kick for Celta Vigo at Municipal de Balaidos.
Can Cadiz get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Celta Vigo's half?
In Vigo Cadiz's Alfonso Espino is caught offside.
In the minute 24, Cadiz's Ivan Alejo breaks free at Municipal de Balaidos. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Ball goes out of play for a Celta Vigo goal kick.
Guillermo Cuadra Fernandez awards Celta Vigo a goal kick.
In the minute 26, Free kick for Cadiz in the half of Celta Vigo.
Celta Vigo have been given a penalty...
Ball safe as Cadiz is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 28, Santi Mina is down and play has been interrupted for a few moments.
Iago Aspas gives Celta Vigo a 2-0 lead from the penalty spot.
Santi Mina for Celta Vigo is back on the field again.
In the minute 33, Cadiz awarded a free kick in their own half.
Santi Mina is writhing in pain and play has been suspended for a few moments.
Eduardo Coudet (Celta Vigo) is making a first change, with Fran Beltran replacing the possibly injured Santi Mina.
In the minute 35, In Vigo a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Guillermo Cuadra Fernandez awards the home team a throw-in.
Throw-in for Cadiz in their own half.
In the minute 36, Free kick for Cadiz in the half of Celta Vigo.
Free kick Celta Vigo.
In Vigo Cadiz attack through Alberto Perea. The finish is off target, however.
In the minute 39, Celta Vigo have a goal kick.
Guillermo Cuadra Fernandez signals a Celta Vigo throw-in in Cadiz's half.
Free kick for Celta Vigo in their own half.
In the minute 41, Ball safe as Celta Vigo is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Throw-in Celta Vigo.
Celta Vigo take a comfortable 3-0 lead thanks to Fran Beltran.
In the minute 43, Great play from Iago Aspas to set up the goal.
The 1st half is prolonged by 5 minutes of added time.
Guillermo Cuadra Fernandez signals a free kick to Cadiz in their own half.
The first-half has come to a close in Vigo.
Celta Vigo move into a 4-0 lead through a Brais Mendez header.
In the minute 45, That's a fine assist from Denis Suarez.
In the minute 46, The second half has started at Municipal de Balaidos.
In the minute 46, Guillermo Cuadra Fernandez signals a free kick to Cadiz.
Alvaro Cervera is making the team's first substitution at Municipal de Balaidos with Jorge Pombo replacing Ivan Alejo.
Alvaro Cervera (Cadiz) is making a second substitution, with Jairo Izquierdo replacing Alfonso Espino.
The match has been stopped briefly for attention to the injured Joseph Aidoo.
Throw-in for Celta Vigo at Municipal de Balaidos.
In the minute 49, Celta Vigo’s Joseph Aidoo is on his feet again at Municipal de Balaidos.
Cadiz awarded a free kick in their own half.
In Vigo a free kick has been awarded the away team.
In the minute 54, Denis Suarez (Celta Vigo) has received a first yellow card.
Celta Vigo's Iago Aspas gets his shot away but it misses the target.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Vigo.
In the minute 55, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
At Municipal de Balaidos, Nestor Araujo has been yellow-carded for the home team.
Corner awarded to Cadiz.
Goal kick for Celta Vigo at Municipal de Balaidos.
In the minute 58, Marcos Mauro (Cadiz) gets a yellow card.
In the minute 59, In Vigo a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Attention is being given to Celta Vigo’s Brais Mendez and play has been suspended briefly.
Celta Vigo are pushing forward but Iago Aspas's finish is wide of the goal.
In the minute 61, Ball goes out of play for a Cadiz goal kick.
Celta Vigo's Brais Mendez is back in action after a slight knock.
Iago Aspas for Celta Vigo is whistled offside.
In the minute 65, Free kick for Cadiz in the half of Celta Vigo.
Celta Vigo to take a throw-in in Cadiz territory.
Celta Vigo make their second substitution with Miguel Baeza replacing Renato Tapia.
In the minute 67, The home team have replaced Denis Suarez with Okay Yokuslu. This is the third substitution made today by Eduardo Coudet.
Guillermo Cuadra Fernandez awards Celta Vigo a goal kick.
Can Cadiz capitalize from this dangerous free kick?
In the minute 69, Garrido is replacing Jens Jonsson for Cadiz at Municipal de Balaidos.
In the minute 70, Throw-in for Cadiz in the half of Celta Vigo.
Filip Malbasic is on a sub for Alvaro Gimenez for Cadiz.
The away team have replaced Alvaro Negredo with Anthony Lozano. This is the fifth substitution made today by Alvaro Cervera.
Can Cadiz get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Celta Vigo's half?
Guillermo Cuadra Fernandez signals a Cadiz throw-in in Celta Vigo's half.
In the minute 73, Celta Vigo awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Alex of Cadiz is pulled up for offside.
Cadiz are in shooting range from this free kick.
In the minute 76, Filip Malbasic (Cadiz) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Throw-in for Celta Vigo at Municipal de Balaidos.
Jose Fontan is replacing Brais Mendez for the home team.
Filip Malbasic (Cadiz) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
In the minute 77, Eduardo Coudet is making the team's fifth substitution at Municipal de Balaidos with Lautaro De Leon Billar replacing Nolito.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Vigo.
In the minute 79, Free kick for Celta Vigo in their own half.
Celta Vigo will need to be alert as they defend a dangerous free kick from Cadiz.
Cadiz have been awarded a corner by Guillermo Cuadra Fernandez.
In the minute 82, Goal kick for Celta Vigo at Municipal de Balaidos.
Can Cadiz get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Celta Vigo's half?
Cadiz have a goal kick.
In the minute 83, Celta Vigo have been awarded a corner by Guillermo Cuadra Fernandez.
In Vigo, Nestor Araujo (Celta Vigo) misses the target with a header.
Guillermo Cuadra Fernandez awards Cadiz a goal kick.
In the minute 84, Throw-in Celta Vigo.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Vigo.
Celta Vigo's Iago Aspas is whistled for offside at Municipal de Balaidos.
In the minute 89, Cadiz awarded a free kick in their own half.
Throw-in for Cadiz in the half of Celta Vigo.
Guillermo Cuadra Fernandez signals a free kick to Cadiz just outside Celta Vigo's area.
3 minutes will be added to the 2nd half in Vigo.
Cadiz's Alberto Perea attacks the ball with his head but his effort fails to hit the target.
Goal kick for Celta Vigo at Municipal de Balaidos.
Corner awarded to Cadiz.
Guillermo Cuadra Fernandez signals a free kick to Celta Vigo in their own half.
It's 4-0 as the referee blows for full-time.
